name: Hentai Tales: Succubus Utopia
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

Legend has it that creatures like succubus exist in the world. They will sneak into the dreams of sleeping men late at night and have sex with the men in their dreams to obtain the nutrients they need.
You are about to have an unforgettable relationship with these succubus.
What will be here?

Characters

Hamiri:

Hamiri is a healing succubus who is about to have an unforgettable sexual intercourse with you in Wonderland.

Koni:

Koni has a mischievous personality and likes to torture humans who can't resist her, but things may be different this time.

Lisami:

Lisami is a succubus with a strong sexual desire. She often has sex with different men in the world. No man seems to be able to satisfy her, and she is still looking for a man who can.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
